page.title: 01GENERAL FEATURES
page.content: Area covers land to east of{Bath}city and includes parishes of{Swainswick, {Larkhall,Bathampton,Batheaston}and {Bathford.}Area of extreme natural beauty in valley of{River Avon. Kennet and{Avon Canal}flows through area.Parishes connected by A4 London road,A46 and A36.There are plans to preserve the area by extending {Cotswold Area of Outstanding Beauty. It is mainly rural and wooded, residential and commercial property being largely in parishes and eastern outskirts of city.Little industry and the few commercial enterprises are mainly farms, nurseries,guest houses, agricultural suppliers and mills.Other items of interest include a toll bridge, historic houses, iron age fort, a folly and secret underground city.
